text:
Hi! Regarding to local development using HubSpot-cli.
Is there any chance that i could see changes I am applying locally without pushing it to HubSpot?
It doesn't make sense to me that I can see changes only after watch command(when we upload changes to HubSpot)

Broadly, no — there isn’t a way to preview changes entirely locally. Your changes need to be uploaded to the platform so that new pages can be rendered using system/CMS data.

The exception to this is if you’re building your site using React Islands/JS blocks. In that case, there is a local server which allows hot-reloaded previews of your React elements _(but not whole pages or sites)_. However, that functionality is experimental, and I wouldn’t recommend it if you’re not experienced with the platform.
